37185.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「うえぇ～～ん！\n:
WAaaah! WAAaAaaaaah!!
I-I-I... *Sniff* My special, sparkling ring got stolen by a big bird... I got it for my birthday... *Sniff* I really, really loved it.
Mr. bird flew off far away. East past the mountains... I bet he went to Kirika Steppe's Bird Forest...
Please, traveler... *Sniff*. Please get back my ring...

37186.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「えぐっ えぐっ……:
Egh, egh... Thanks, traveler. I heard that you can get to Kirika Steppe by leaving town and going straight northeast...
Umm, that ring, you know, is something my mama gave me; it's my most favoritest thing.
If you get me back my ring, I'll give you my second most favoritest thing, ok.

37189.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「でっかい鳥さんは:

me; it's my most favoritest thing... Egh, egh...

48231.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「ハァ……。ボク 領:
Haa... At the lord's mansion, the Azlantelopes' caretaker, Fushiko, makes my heart go pitter-patter.
I heard a rumor that Fushiko wants a flower called the 'Windwhistle Lily', so I thought I'd give it to her as a present.
It seems that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s in Azlan Region drop it, but... It's just... Traveler, you're strong, aren't you?
Please do me a favor! Will you defeat the <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s in my place and get a Windwhistle Lily for me?

48232.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ああっ ありが:
Aah, thank you so much! For hearing me out a favor like this for me... You really are a nice person, y'know!
Well then, please be careful on your way, okay. I'll be waiting for you here!

48233.「ああっ ありがとうございます！\n でも ひょっとして 他にも たくさん\n:
Aah, thank you so much! But by any chance, don't you have a lot of other favors to take care of?
Since I'm not in such a hurry, first please prioritize your other request. And once you're free, please call on me again, okay.

48234.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「うっ……！ そ そ:

a <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>'s. Haa... What should I do...

48238.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「あっ…… そうでし:

48239.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「わあっ！ なん:

no mistaking it!<bw_break>

48531.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「でも…… ボ ボク:

That's it! I'll attach a message card to the flower! Let's see... ''Always thinking of you -Maetake''... That's good!

48786.<pc>は マエタケに\n風音のユリを 託された！<me 60>:

by Maetake!<me 60>

48243.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「まあっ こんに:

48244.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「まあ 気のせいでし: <attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Just my imagination? Oh no, I'm... So embarrassed.

48245.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「まあっ マエタ:

48246.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「風音のユリは:
Windwhistle Lilies are very rare flowers that bloom on super windy hills and are said to hold the power of the wind.
It's said that Azlantelopes eating Windwhistle Lilies is what makes them run like the wind and jump so high.

48249.フシコは 風音のユリを カムシカに食べさせた。\n<br>\nしかし フシコは:

34076.「世を 神の望みし姿に近づけるため\n 我らキリカ修道会の僧侶は\n 日夜 きび:
To bring the world closer to the image of the Goddess' desire, we priests of the Kirika Order devote ourselves day and night to our strict discipline.
Hmm. You seem to be a level 10+ priest; did you come here to be initiated into the Order?

34077.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「それでは しば:
Then, please wait for a while. Currently, the one who decides upon newcomers, Priest Helga, has just left on an outing, you see.
For some reason, she seemed to want to go and gather fragrant wood and the like... Umm, I wonder why she is taking so long to return.
If you want to hear more details, you should ask the traveling incense maker there.

34078.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「僧侶の身であり:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>You are a priest and yet you do not want to join the
Kirika Order. You really are an eccentric person,
aren't you?

34079.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「はぁ…… 参っちゃ:
Haa... I'm at a loss. Someone like me might be a 100 years too early to be worrying about Priestess Helga, but...
...Oh? You're a level 10+ priest, right. So you must have come to enter the Kirika Order?
If so, it would be a good idea to speak with Father Bart there. Then again, now may not be the best time for that...

34080.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「しばし お待ち:
Then, please wait for a while. Currently, the one who decides upon newcomers, Priest Helga, has just left on an outing, you see.
For some reason, she seemed to want to go and gather fragrant wood and the like... Umm, I wonder why she is taking so long to return.
If you want to hear more details, you should ask the traveling incense maker there.

34081.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「私は 旅の香術師。:
I am a traveling incense maker. Using scents to conjure spells to cure people of their illnesses is what I do as a traveling incense maker.
Priestess Helga went to Mirror Fountain to gather a fragrant tree called the 'Lamplight Tree' for me and has yet to return.
I tried to find the location of Mirror Fountain by following what was wrote in a riddle poem, you see. That, for me, was hopeless.
But perhaps if it were you...! I beg you! Please, won't you go to Mirror Fountain and find Priestess Helga for me!?

34082.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ホ ホントです:
Re-really? Thank you very much!
The riddle poem that points to the Mirror Fountain's location is written in a book within this shrine. I'm counting on you!

34083.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ホ ホントですか？:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Re-really? But please, wait a minute. You have too
many requests, don't you. If that's the case, I can
ask another. I'm just overwhelmed by your kindness.

34084.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「ああっ。やっぱり:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Aah. I knew you'd say that, y'know... Sorry for being
so unreasonable.

34085.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ありがとうござ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Thank you very much, priest! I can't believe you
would do me such a favor.<open_irai><bw_break>

34086.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><close_i:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><close_irai>By all rights, I should have asked one of the Kirika
Order, but... It appears that no one is available to
lend a hand.

48833.ほこりをかぶった 古い書物だ。\n<br>\nみかがみの泉を 目指す者よ。\n水:
There is a dusty old book.
O those after the Mirror Fountain: go to the marshland, where water flows and plants grow. Surrounding the tower that pierces the heavens, a circle of waters.
Around that which bridges the water, aim for the tower's back. A tree bejeweled with rays of light contains that which you so seek, the Mirror Fountain.
